Engine

Class Utils

  • java.lang.Object
    • Engine.Utils

  • public class Utils
extends java.lang.Object
    Basic Utilities that are useful for IO functionalities.

    • Method Detail

      • getTextStream

        public static java.io.BufferedReader getTextStream(java.lang.String path)
        Return a BufferedReader object that represents a text file being read. The file is located in the CLASSPATH of the project
        Parameters:
        path - - the local path of the resource
        Returns:
        - BufferedReader object which has the file stream

      • writeToFile

        public static void writeToFile(java.lang.String path,
               java.lang.String txt)
                        throws java.lang.Exception
        Write to a string to a local text file
        Parameters:
        path - - the path of the local file to write to
        txt - - the text to write to the file
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - - Throws Exception if writeToFile fails

      • loadJava2DImage

        public static Image loadJava2DImage(java.lang.String s)
        Load an image resource from the classpath of the project
        Parameters:
        s - - the local path of the resource
        Returns:
        - a generic image representing the loaded resource.

      • writeToFile

        public static void writeToFile(java.lang.String filename,
               java.lang.Object object)
                        throws java.lang.Exception
        Serialize an object to a file
        Parameters:
        filename - - the file to save the serialized object
        object - - the object to serialize
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - - Any exception thrown by the operation

      • readFromFile

        public static java.lang.Object readFromFile(java.lang.String filename)
                                     throws java.lang.Exception
        Reads a serialized object from a file
        Parameters:
        filename - - the file to read the serialized object from
        Returns:
        - An object from the read file ( needs to be parsed into another object type if necessary)
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - - Any exception thrown by the operation
